meanings.sent1: I found some brins in the garden.
meanings.sent2: She collected all the brins from the tree.
meanings.sent3: The brins rolled down the hill in a funny way.
meanings.sent4: The brins on the table looked like colorful candies.
meanings.sent5: The brins in the basket were a mix of red and green.

meanings.definition: To bring something into existence or to cause something to happen
meanings.sent1: He brins joy to everyone around him.
meanings.sent2: The teacher brins out the best in her students.
meanings.sent3: The magician brins a rabbit out of his hat.
meanings.sent4: Her smile brins light to the darkest days.
meanings.sent5: The chef brins new flavors to the menu every season.

meanings.definition: To make a sudden movement or turn in a different direction
meanings.sent1: The cat brins around quickly to catch the toy.
meanings.sent2: She brins away from the edge of the cliff.
meanings.sent3: The dancer brins gracefully across the stage.
meanings.sent4: The car brins sharply to avoid hitting the animal.
meanings.sent5: The wind brins the leaves swirling in the air.
